name: Carry Me To Clown College
description:
This game requires the player to guide Bobo the clown to his college, all while he slowly floats down towards the ground. Touching the ground, or hitting into the school itself, will result in a game over. Clouds, trampolines and bouncy castles will propel Bobo back into the air, while the birds will knock him down. Grabbing a present will award extra points, if you manage to guide him to the end and land on a balcony (higher balconies will also award more points).

Created with:

C#
Unity

Programming and design by Jack Hutchines.
Art and design by Elenore Linsell.
